content: Hello! How can I assist you today?
I don't have real-time capabilities to check the current time. You can easily find the time on your device or by searching online. If you need help with something else, feel free to ask!
who is the president in israel

As of my last knowledge update in October 2023, the President of Israel is Isaac Herzog. He took office on July 7, 2021. Please verify with a current source to ensure this information is still accurate.
